text:
Apart from having a good artist, there also needs to be a good team of staff who carry his heart. That makes the experience all the more beautiful.

David and Angie were two such staff who welcomed me today! They happily showed me some features of the paintings (like the AR) and also how the pieces are mounted :)

Glad to have taken time from work to see the art in person, and the wonderful people at work to create a good experience for customers.

Shalom! üòä

I have been to quite a few art galleries, in various countries around the world, but I have yet to experience, sense, and literally feel the awe of being in one's home-base of creation and art expression.
Seeing Patrick's numerous art pieces, varying in kind and form - has touched my very core, and I'm forever changed by the experience.

Incredibly immersive experience. A visit to this gallery is highly recommended, the Artist incorporate AR into his art pieces, really fun to watch the art pieces come to life on my phone. Love the hyperrealism art work, got 1 at home now!
Amazing gallery with great vision and details. Welcoming staff and intricate stories in a safe space. Highly reccomend.
